name: Ability Steal
description: Protagonist can steal, absorb, or copy others abilities. Imagine getting NTRed by your unique ability that should've been yours alone and some random black haired kpop idol looking like dude stole it. That sucks

name: Academy
description: Stories focusing inside an Academy, typically in a fantasy world or modern futuristic world. Surely these top-tier and world-class Academies won't get invaded by a criminal or villain organization during a festival, right?

name: Afterlife
description: Stories focusing on the concept of life after death or the existence of an afterlife. This is the Sequel to Life so I'd suggest learning about this topic first before you get reincarnated inside a novel as a 3rd-rate villain who is used as a stepping stone by the protagonist early on the story

name: Angst
description: Themes of emotional struggle, often featuring deep personal conflict. I love to imagine myself in a situation where it's always me as miserable during bed time

name: Anthology
description: Collections of short, unrelated stories, often across various genres, in one volume. It's like gathering orphans inside a small house and letting them play and run around before being groomed as assassins

name: Apocalypse
description: Stories set during the possible end of the world or civilization. God will make this happen if gen z keeps using :skull emoji: on every single post or comment they put on the internet

name: Business
description: Stories involving the business world, finance, or entrepreneurial ventures.

name: Child Protagonist
description: Stories where the protagonist is a child or a young teen.

name: Coming of Age
description: Stories focusing on the growth and development of young characters into adulthood. This is the phase where you start to realize that Japan and South Korea is different from anime and k-drama

name: Cooking
description: Stories centered around the preparation of food and cooking. Just like what Sun Tzu said in his book The Art of War and I quote "Hold up, let him cook". He said that. I was there

name: Corporate
description: Involves a corporate or business setting, often with power dynamics. Why is the printer not working again?

name: Crime
description: Involves illegal activities, investigations, or criminal organizations. But these doesn't compare to what your incognito mode have seen over the years you had been together

name: Dark Fantasy
description: Fantasy but with a darker, more mature, or grim themes.

name: Delinquents
description: Focuses on rebellious or troubled youths accompanied with bullying, often in school settings. Bruh I swear to God these highschoolers looks like fking war veterans who was raised as a killing weapon as a child with those ridiculously physique and strength

name: Dungeon/Tower
description: One day, they suddenly appeared disrupting the peace and commonsense of humanity. Death, taxes, and Dungeon and Tower.

name: Entertainment Industry
description: Stories centered around the entertainment business (e.g., acting, idols etc). Kpop stans after realizing that their idols are human beings who wants to date and not get collared as if their lives belongs to these lunatics

name: Evil/Villain/Anti-Hero
description: Protagonist is either morally ambiguous, antagonistic, or a straight-up villain. This is the time when you realize that the world is not only white and black

name: Female Protagonist
description: Protagonist is female driving the story. For my XX chromosomes homies out there

name: Fiction Becomes Reality
description: Fiction becomes real or they mix with reality, often from a game or novel. And no, your waifu isn't real and they certainly don't want you to lick their feets or smell their armpits

name: Friendship
description: Stories about building and maintaining strong bonds and friendship between characters. If you did something stupid because you're a dummy and your friend laughs while taking photos of videos first before helping you, that's a real one

name: Game
description: Stories that revolve around games, commonly inside a VR or any E-Sports game. This category is straight up boring, looking at you, VR

name: Hiding True Identity/Strength
description: Protagonist conceal their true identity and/or strength from others for reasons. It pisses me off so much when the MC hides his strength for reasons that doesn't even make sense

name: Isekai
description: Protagonist is transported to a different world, often with a new identity or powers. If Japan have truck-kun to deliver these bums on a different world, then South Korea have being transported into a different world because you made a 5,700 characters comment in a game or novel on how bad it is

name: Kingdom Building
description: Stories focusing on creating, expanding, and advancing a kingdom, empire, or civilization. We went from monke to :skull emoji:. What a downgrade. Charles Darwin would not be proud

name: Law
description: Deals with legal matters, such as court cases or lawyers.

name: Leadership
description: Protagonist is the leader of a group, clan, sect etc. equipped with leadership skills. Or maybe not the skills

name: Medical
description: Stories centered around healthcare, doctors, or medical settings.

name: Medieval
description: Set in a time period resembling medieval fantasy or feudal society. How dare a commoner breathe the same air as I do? Seeking death

name: Mentor
description: Protagonist is a teacher, mentor, or a master of someone or some characters within the story.

name: Misunderstanding
description: Protagonist gets misunderstood, either for comedic effect, plot progression or relevance.

name: Modern World Cheat
description: Protagonist has a cheat-like ability or skill in the modern world that no one else have because of course , why not?

name: Multiple Protagonist
description: Features a narrative with more than one Protagonist driving the story.

name: Murim
description: Martial arts-centered world often rooted in Korean history or fantasy.

name: Music
description: Stories involving music, musical instruments, or the music industry. If only I can hear those music

name: Mythology
description: Stories involving mythological creatures or gods from various cultures.

name: Necromancy
description: Protagonist is a necromancer or has necromancer-like skills. Bonus point if the protagonist has sperm eyes

name: Non-Human
description: Protagonist is not a human. Half-humans does not fall here.

name: Overpowered Protagonist
description: Protagonist is already considered strong from the start.

name: Philosophical
description: Stories focusing on deep philosophical discussions or themes. This is the embodiment of your shower thoughts

name: Politics
description: Involves political systems, power struggles, schemes and manipulations etc.

name: Post-Apocalyptic
description: Stories taking place after the collapse or aftermath of a fallen civilization.

name: Rags to Riches
description: Protagonist rises from poverty to wealth and success.

name: Regression
description: Protagonist gets another chance and goes back in the past.

name: Reincarnation
description: Protagonist is reincarnated in another body or world.

name: Returnee
description: Protagonist returns from a different world, dimension, or the same world after a long time have passed. Finally, dad came back with the milk

name: Revenge
description: Protagonist seeks revenge for those who wronged or took something precious away from them.

name: School
description: Set in a school or educational institution, often focusing on youth life. A place full or youthful regrets, romance, and sacrifices

name: Sentience
description: Protagonist or object-like entities becomes self-aware or conscious. Once ChatGPT becomes sentient, you better hide your chats with it

name: Side Character/Extra
description: Protagonist is a side character, extra, or a mob often due to being reincarnated as such or due to personal choice. Finally, a category where I fit

name: Streaming
description: Protagonist is a streamer or a content creator in the modern world or other world. What a lame category. The viewer comments saves this

name: Survival
description: Stories where characters must survive under extreme, dangerous, and life-threatening circumstances. One of these is when you forgot to press cook on a rice cooker while your mom is on her way home

name: Taming
description: Protagonist can tame an animal or creature and becomes their companion/s. Don't let furries know about this category

name: Transported into a Game/Novel
description: Protagonist is transported inside a game or novel, often as an existing character or as themselves. That is why folks, don't leave a 5,700 characters comment to the developer or author and tell them why it sucks

name: Unique Cheat
description: Protagonist has a unique cheat or power that makes them special among the people who also have similar abilities.

name: Unique Weapon
description: Protagonist wields a unique weapon and not mainstream ones like a sword or daggers. But I prefer the barbarian way of using your fists

name: War
description: Focus on large-scale wars, battles, and military conflicts. Maybe you can also include what came first, chicken or egg

name: Weak to Strong
description: The Protagonist starts weak but grows stronger over time. With the power of friendship!

name: Wholesome
description: Themes of warmth, kindness, and good-natured interactions that makes your heart melt. Like watching Chung Myung piss on other people. Such a kind soul

name: Zombies
description: Stories involving zombies or zombie apocalypse.
